sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid } from '@mui/material' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import Posts from './components/Posts/posts' import Form from './components/Posts/Form/form' import {getPosts} from './actions/post' import memories from './images/memories.png' import useStyles from './styles' const App = () => { const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect( () => { dispatch(getPosts()) }, [dispatch]) return ( <> Memories
) } export default App
